archimate:BusinessService.name: Summaries of invoices pertaining specific products
archimate:BusinessService.documentation: Report summarizing invoices pertaining to specific products, clients/suppliers, countries, locations, qualities, quantities, or other relevant categories. Key use case to be explored further: Supplier/Client account statements, allowing a customer or supplier to see past and future invoices (receivables/payables) in the database. (for internal use - or for two SMEs trading with each other)
